content: below to close any gaps knit to needle one 3 ©twinstitchesdesigns 2019 all rights reserved gusset toe decrease gusset stitches round 1 round 1 k1 ssk knit to the last 3 needle 1 knit all stitches stitches k2tog k1 repeat on both needle 2 k1 ssk knit to 3 stitches needles before the end of row k2tog k1 round 2 knit round 2 continue these two rounds until you needle 1 & 2 knit all stitches have reached 10 12 12 stitches left on each needle graft together using the repeat these two rounds until you ve kitchener stitch and weave in all ends reached your original stitch count 56 block as desired 64 72 continue in stockinette until your work measures 1 25 1 5 1 75 / 3 1 3 8 4 4 cm shorter than your total foot length or desired negative ease proceed to the toe 4 ©twinstitchesdesigns 2019 all rights reserved abbreviations bor beginning of round co cast on k knit k2tog knit two stitches together p purl sl slip_stitch ssk slip the next two stitches one at a time as if to knit insert the left hand needle through the front of these stitches and knit them together through their back loops thank you for purchasing my pattern you can find me on ravelry and ig @ julieannknitter use #twinstitchesdesigns and #husbandsfavouritesocks to share your creations email twinstitchesdesigns3@gmail com for any questions 5 ©twinstitchesdesigns 2019 all rights reserved
